org.factcenter.qilin.primitives.concrete

Class ECGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.factcenter.qilin.primitives.concrete.ECGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CyclicGroup<org.bouncycastle.math.ec.ECPoint>, Group<org.bouncycastle.math.ec.ECPoint>, Sampler<org.bouncycastle.math.ec.ECPoint>, ByteEncoder<org.bouncycastle.math.ec.ECPoint>, StreamEncoder<org.bouncycastle.math.ec.ECPoint>

    public class ECGroup
extends java.lang.Object
implements CyclicGroup<org.bouncycastle.math.ec.ECPoint>, ByteEncoder<org.bouncycastle.math.ec.ECPoint>, StreamEncoder<org.bouncycastle.math.ec.ECPoint>
    An Elliptic-Curve group. Uses the BouncyCastle library for the low-level elliptic-curve operations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LOG_LOG_ENCODING_ERROR_RATE
      Failure prob.
      static int NONCE_LENGTH
      Size of random nonce (in bytes) used in injective encoding

    • Field Detail

      • LOG_LOG_ENCODING_ERROR_RATE

        public static final int LOG_LOG_ENCODING_ERROR_RATE
        Failure prob. for encoding is at most 2^-{2^LOG_LOG_ENCODING_ERROR_RATE}
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NONCE_LENGTH

        public static final int NONCE_LENGTH
        Size of random nonce (in bytes) used in injective encoding

        public java.math.BigInteger orderUpperBound()
        Description copied from interface: Group
        Get a bound on the order of the group. The actual order of the group MUST divide this bound (useful for choosing a random element of the group with a known discrete log)

      • getInjectiveEncodeMsgLength

        public int getInjectiveEncodeMsgLength()
                                throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Specified by:
        getInjectiveEncodeMsgLength in interface Group<org.bouncycastle.math.ec.ECPoint>
        Returns:
        the length (in bytes) of a message that can be encoded using the Group.injectiveEncode(byte[], Random) method. Shorter messages will be zero-padded at the end, longer messages will be truncated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
